channel.title: Need A Hoster!
channel.description:
Yo guys, i have a custom coded server fully built and ready source with Custom ranks Custom crowns Custom items All features Just nearly everything! :P
All i need is a hoster so if you can do this for a little bit (we won't need you to host for a long time just until we get a vps) however you will get a very high rank in the server and payment in donations to cover your time as the hoster so you will effectively be hosting for couple of weeks then you will be a high rank in a server that promises to be a good one.
If you can do so either comment below or PM me ASAP Thanks

item.title: Need A Hoster!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

No sir, you cannot request a host anywhere on this site.

Read full topic
